quote: Every lawyer is an actor. The place where a lawyer's acting ability shines most is certainly in the courtroom, but it works very well in the boardroom and in the office.

Shakespeare reveals human nature brilliantly: he shines a light on our instinctive desire to dominate each other.

When Honor's sun declines, and Wealth takes wings, Then Learning shines, the best of precious things.

I like making people laugh. It comes off and shines in everything I do.

Real talent shines through regardless of how many others there are around you.

I think if you put 100% into anything and you do it with authenticity and enthusiasm, then it really shines through.

I think Cate Blanchett is fabulous - she just shines in everything she does - and I'm a big Susan Sarandon fan.

It seems to conceal, but it really shines a light on what we want, what we need, and what we'll do to get it. Especially when we think no one can see us.

In baseball, democracy shines its clearest. The only race that matters is the race to the bag. The creed is the rule book. And color, merely something to distinguish one team's uniform from another's.

Of my English friends, I should find language too poor to speak the just praise and the excellence which shines in their characters and lives.

When you wake up each morning, you can choose to be happy or choose to be sad. Unless some terrible catastrophe has occurred the night before, it is pretty much up to you. Tomorrow morning, when the sun shines through your window, choose to make it a happy day.

All the world lies warm in one heart, yet the Sierra seems to get more light than other mountains. The weather is mostly sunshine embellished with magnificent storms, and nearly everything shines from base to summit - the rocks, streams, lakes, glaciers, irised falls, and the forests of silver fir and silver pine.
God is good for everybody. The sun shines on good people and bad people, and it rains on both, too. God doesn't choose rain only for bad people.

God is like the sun. When the sun shines, it shines for everyone. God is for everyone.

Opportunities and 'friendships' will evaporate. Failure shines a bright light on all relationships. The ones that last are pure and true, which is a true gift.
